  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    dev.morphia.AbstractEntityInterceptor
    the noop default methods have been moved to the interface. This class is now vestigial.
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore
     
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.createAggregation(String, Class<?>)
    use Datastore.aggregate(Class) and pass the alternate collection via the options on Aggregation.execute(Class, AggregationOptions)
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.createQuery(Class<T>, Document)
    use Datastore.find(Class, Document)
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.createRef(Class<T>, V)
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.createRef(T)
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.createUpdateOperations(Class<T>, DBObject)
    use Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.insert(List<T>, InsertOptions)
    use Datastore.insert(List, InsertManyOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.insert(T, InsertOptions)
    use Datastore.insert(Object, InsertOneOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.queryByExample(String, T)

    use Aggregation instead

    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Group.of()

    use Group.group(GroupId)
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.IndexStats.of()
    use IndexStats.indexStats()
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Limit.of(long)
    use Limit.limit(long)
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Lookup.from(Class<?>)
    use Lookup.lookup(Class)

    use Lookup.lookup(String)

    use Match.match(Filter...)

    use PlanCacheStats.planCacheStats()
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Projection.of()
    use Projection.project()

    use ReplaceRoot.replaceRoot()

    use ReplaceWith.replaceWith()

    use ReplaceWith.replaceWith(Expression)

    use Sample.sample(long)
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Skip.of(long)
    use Skip.skip(long)
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Sort.on()
    use Sort.sort()
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.SortByCount.on(Expression)
    use SortByCount.sortByCount(Expression)

    use Unset.unset(String, String...)

    dev.morphia.annotations.experimental.Constructor
    This annotation is not necessary and will be removed soon.
    dev.morphia.annotations.NotSaved
    use LoadOnly instead
    dev.morphia.config.MorphiaConfig.codecProvider()
    this configuration entry will be updated to use SPI as with other customizations

    This should be configured in the MongoClient given to Morphia
    dev.morphia.Datastore.createAggregation(Class<?>)
    use Datastore.aggregate(Class) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.createQuery(Class<T>)
    use Datastore.find(Class)
    dev.morphia.Datastore.createUpdateOperations(Class<T>)
    use Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.delete(Query<T>)
    use Query.delete() instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.delete(Query<T>, DeleteOptions)
    use Query.delete(DeleteOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.enableDocumentValidation()
    this is handled by the config file and should not be called directly
    dev.morphia.Datastore.ensureCaps()
    this is handled by the config file and should not be called directly
    dev.morphia.Datastore.ensureIndexes()
    this is configured by the config file and doesn't need to be called directly
    dev.morphia.Datastore.find(String, Class<T>)
    use FindOptions.collection(String) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.findAndDelete(Query<T>)
    use Query.findAndDelete() instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.findAndDelete(Query<T>, FindAndModifyOptions)
    use Query.findAndDelete(FindAndDeleteOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.findAndModify(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>)
    use Query.modify(UpdateOperations) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.findAndModify(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, FindAndModifyOptions)
    use Query.modify(UpdateOperations) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.getLoggedQuery(FindOptions)
    Use Query.getLoggedQuery() instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.merge(T, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.merge(Object, InsertOneOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.save(Iterable<T>)
    use Datastore.save(List) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.save(Iterable<T>, InsertOptions)
    use Datastore.save(List, InsertManyOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.save(T, InsertOptions)
    use Datastore.save(Object, InsertOneOptions) instead
    dev.morphia.Datastore.update(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>)
    use Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead. Please note the default has changed from multi- to single-document updates.
    dev.morphia.Datastore.update(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, UpdateOptions)
    use Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead
    dev.morphia.DeleteOptions.isMulti()
    dev.morphia.EntityInterceptor
    use EntityListener instead. The interface is the same but generic and the name aligns better with the EntityListeners annotation.
    dev.morphia.EntityInterceptor.postLoad(Object, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityInterceptor.postPersist(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if
    dev.morphia.EntityInterceptor.postPersist(Object, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityInterceptor.postPersist(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if
    dev.morphia.EntityInterceptor.preLoad(Object, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityInterceptor.preLoad(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if necessary
    dev.morphia.EntityInterceptor.prePersist(Object, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityInterceptor.prePersist(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if necessary
    dev.morphia.EntityListener.postLoad(T, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityListener.postPersist(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if
    dev.morphia.EntityListener.postPersist(T, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityListener.postPersist(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if
    dev.morphia.EntityListener.preLoad(T, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityListener.preLoad(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if necessary
    dev.morphia.EntityListener.prePersist(T, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityListener.prePersist(Object, Document, Datastore) instead and access the Mapper via Datastore.getMapper() if necessary

    dev.morphia.query.Query.keys(FindOptions)
    dev.morphia.query.Query.modify(UpdateOperations<T>)
     
    dev.morphia.query.Query.modify(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...)
    consider Query.modify(ModifyOptions, UpdateOperator...) instead. In the next major version, this return type will match the other's return type such that this will be the terminal call for a modify. The only change needed then will be to remove the Modify.execute() call.
    dev.morphia.query.Query.or(Criteria...)
    dev.morphia.query.Query.retrieveKnownFields()
    use FindOptions.projection()
    dev.morphia.query.Query.search(String)
    use Filters.text(String) instead
    dev.morphia.query.Query.search(String, String)
    use Filters.text(String) instead
    dev.morphia.query.Query.update(UpdateOperations<T>)
    use Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...)
    dev.morphia.query.Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...)
    use Query.update(UpdateOptions, UpdateOperator...) instead. In the next major version, this return type will match the other's return type such that this will be the terminal call for an update. The only change needed then will be to remove the Update.execute() call.
    dev.morphia.query.Query.update(List<UpdateOperator>)
    use Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead
    dev.morphia.query.QueryFactory.createQuery(Datastore)
    this method is no longer used
    dev.morphia.query.Shape
    use the driver provide facilities instead.
    dev.morphia.query.UpdateOperations
    updates should be performed using the Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead of this class directly
    dev.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl
    dev.morphia.query.Updates.removeAll(String, Object)
    use Updates.pull(String, Object) instead
    dev.morphia.query.Updates.removeAll(String, List<?>)
    use Updates.pullAll(String, List) instead
    dev.morphia.query.WhereCriteria
    dev.morphia.UpdateOptions.isMulti()
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    dev.morphia.AdvancedDatastore
     
    dev.morphia.aggregation.AggregationPipeline
    use Aggregation instead
    dev.morphia.EntityInterceptor
    use EntityListener instead. The interface is the same but generic and the name aligns better with the EntityListeners annotation.
    dev.morphia.geo.Geometry
    use the driver-provided types instead
    dev.morphia.query.Criteria
    dev.morphia.query.CriteriaContainer
     
    dev.morphia.query.FieldEnd
    dev.morphia.query.UpdateOperations
    updates should be performed using the Query.update(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...) instead of this class directly
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    dev.morphia.AbstractEntityInterceptor
    the noop default methods have been moved to the interface. This class is now vestigial.
    dev.morphia.aggregation.AggregationPipelineImpl
     
    dev.morphia.aggregation.GeoNear

  • Deprecated Annotation Interfaces
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    dev.morphia.annotations.Converters
    dev.morphia.annotations.Embedded
    It is now possible to use @Entity everywhere. If a type is only for use as an embedded value, no @Id field is necessary.
    dev.morphia.annotations.experimental.Constructor
    This annotation is not necessary and will be removed soon.
    dev.morphia.annotations.NotSaved
    use LoadOnly instead

    dev.morphia.query.Query.modify(UpdateOperator, UpdateOperator...)
    consider Query.modify(ModifyOptions, UpdateOperator...) instead. In the next major version, this return type will match the other's return type such that this will be the terminal call for a modify. The only change needed then will be to remove the Modify.execute() call.
